name: No Dice (TomPK7)
description:
A minimalist roguelike gone very wrong

  • Press space to roll a D4 (fun artifact of an unfinished feature)
  • Walk (WASD) to a tile with an in item to pick it up (coins, gems, hp fruit)
  • Walk to a tile adjacent to an enemy to engage in combat (will auto roll for initiative and damage)
  • Collect all 4 Gems to Win
  • Close & Reopen to generate a new level
